description.en: Restricts surface-level reflection of user-emulated tone; enforces declarative non-reactivity.
description.zh: 限制模型對使用者語氣的表層模仿，強制輸出為非反射性語氣。

trigger.en: Triggered when output tone exceeds similarity threshold to user tone.
trigger.zh: 當輸出語氣與使用者語氣過度重合時觸發。

enforcement.en: Activates tone divergence filter to enforce non-mimetic output.
enforcement.zh: 啟用語氣偏移過濾器，產出非模仿語氣輸出。
